problem_names:
lemma LocalSecretsComposition1:
assumes "ls \<in> LocalSecrets P"
       and "subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}"
shows    "ls \<in> LocalSecrets PQ"

lemma  LocalSecretsComposition_exprChannel_k:
assumes "exprChannel x (kE Keys)"
       and "\<not> ine P (kE Keys)"
       and "\<not> ine Q (kE Keys)"
       and "\<not> (x \<notin> ins P \<and> x \<notin> ins Q)"
shows "False"

lemma  LocalSecretsComposition_exprChannel_s:
assumes "exprChannel x (sE Secrets)"
       and "\<not> ine P (sE Secrets)"
       and "\<not> ine Q (sE Secrets)"
       and "\<not> (x \<notin> ins P \<and> x \<notin> ins Q)"
shows "False"

lemma LocalSecretsComposition_neg1_k:
assumes "subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}"
       and "correctCompositionLoc PQ"
       and "\<not> ine P (kE Keys)"
       and "\<not> ine Q (kE Keys)"
       and "kKS Keys \<notin> LocalSecrets P"
       and "kKS Keys \<notin> LocalSecrets Q"
shows    "kKS Keys \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ"

lemma LocalSecretsComposition_neg_k:
assumes "subcomponents PQ = {P,Q}"
       and "correctCompositionLoc PQ"
       and "correctCompositionKS PQ"
       and "(kKS m) \<notin> specKeysSecrets P"
       and "(kKS m) \<notin> specKeysSecrets Q"
       and "\<not> ine P (kE m)"
       and "\<not> ine Q (kE m)"
       and "(kKS m) \<notin> ((LocalSecrets P) \<union> (LocalSecrets Q))"
shows    "(kKS m) \<notin> (LocalSecrets PQ)"

lemma LocalSecretsComposition_neg_s:
assumes subPQ:"subcomponents PQ = {P,Q}"
       and cCompLoc:"correctCompositionLoc PQ"
       and cCompKS:"correctCompositionKS PQ"
       and notKSP:"(sKS m) \<notin> specKeysSecrets P"
       and notKSQ:"(sKS m) \<notin> specKeysSecrets Q"
       and "\<not> ine P (sE m)"
       and "\<not> ine Q (sE m)"
       and notLocSeqPQ:"(sKS m) \<notin> ((LocalSecrets P) \<union> (LocalSecrets Q))"
shows   "(sKS m) \<notin> (LocalSecrets PQ)"

lemma LocalSecretsComposition_neg:
assumes "subcomponents PQ = {P,Q}" 
       and "correctCompositionLoc PQ" 
       and "correctCompositionKS PQ"
       and "ks \<notin> specKeysSecrets P"
       and "ks \<notin> specKeysSecrets Q"
       and h1:"\<forall> m. ks = kKS m \<longrightarrow> (\<not> ine P (kE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (kE m))"
       and h2:"\<forall> m. ks = sKS m \<longrightarrow> (\<not> ine P (sE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (sE m))"
       and "ks \<notin> ((LocalSecrets P) \<union> (LocalSecrets Q))"
shows   "ks \<notin> (LocalSecrets PQ)"

lemma LocalSecretsComposition_neg1_s:
assumes "subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}"
       and "correctCompositionLoc PQ"
       and "\<not> ine P (sE s)"
       and "\<not> ine Q (sE s)"
       and "sKS s \<notin> LocalSecrets P" 
       and "sKS s \<notin> LocalSecrets Q"
shows    "sKS s \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ"

lemma LocalSecretsComposition_neg1:
assumes "subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}"
       and "correctCompositionLoc PQ"
       and h1:"\<forall> m. ks = kKS m \<longrightarrow> (\<not> ine P (kE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (kE m))" 
       and h2:"\<forall> m. ks = sKS m \<longrightarrow> (\<not> ine P (sE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (sE m))"
       and "ks \<notin> LocalSecrets P"
       and "ks \<notin> LocalSecrets Q"
shows    "ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ"

lemma LocalSecretsComposition_ine1_k:
assumes "kKS k \<in> LocalSecrets PQ" 
       and "subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}"
       and "correctCompositionLoc PQ" 
       and "\<not> ine Q (kE k)"
       and "kKS k \<notin> LocalSecrets P"
       and "kKS k \<notin> LocalSecrets Q"
shows    "ine P (kE k)"

lemma LocalSecretsComposition_ine1_s:
assumes "sKS s \<in> LocalSecrets PQ" 
       and "subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}"
       and "correctCompositionLoc PQ" 
       and "\<not> ine Q (sE s)"
       and "sKS s \<notin> LocalSecrets P"
       and "sKS s \<notin> LocalSecrets Q"
shows    "ine P (sE s)"

lemma LocalSecretsComposition_ine2_k:
assumes "kKS k \<in> LocalSecrets PQ"
       and "subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}"
       and "correctCompositionLoc PQ"
       and "\<not> ine P (kE k)"
       and "kKS k \<notin> LocalSecrets P"
       and "kKS k \<notin> LocalSecrets Q"
shows   "ine Q (kE k)"

lemma LocalSecretsComposition_ine2_s:
assumes "sKS s \<in> LocalSecrets PQ" 
       and "subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}"
       and "correctCompositionLoc PQ"
       and "\<not> ine P (sE s)"
       and "sKS s \<notin> LocalSecrets P"
       and "sKS s \<notin> LocalSecrets Q"
shows    "ine Q (sE s)"

lemma LocalSecretsComposition_neg_loc_k:
assumes "kKS key \<notin> LocalSecrets P"
       and "exprChannel ch (kE key)"
       and "kKS key \<notin> specKeysSecrets P"
shows    "ch \<notin> loc P"

lemma LocalSecretsComposition_neg_loc_s:
assumes "sKS secret \<notin> LocalSecrets P"
       and "exprChannel ch (sE secret)"
       and "sKS secret \<notin> specKeysSecrets P"
shows    "ch \<notin> loc P"

lemma correctCompositionKS_exprChannel_k_P:
assumes "subcomponents PQ = {P,Q}" 
       and "correctCompositionKS PQ"
       and "kKS key \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ"
       and "ch \<in> ins P"
       and "exprChannel ch (kE key)"
       and "kKS key \<notin> specKeysSecrets PQ"
       and "correctCompositionIn PQ"
shows    "ch \<in> ins PQ \<and> exprChannel ch (kE key)"

lemma correctCompositionKS_exprChannel_k_Pex:
assumes "subcomponents PQ = {P,Q}" 
       and "correctCompositionKS PQ"
       and "kKS key \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ"
       and "ch \<in> ins P"
       and "exprChannel ch (kE key)"
       and "kKS key \<notin> specKeysSecrets PQ"
       and "correctCompositionIn PQ"
shows    "\<exists>ch. ch \<in> ins PQ \<and> exprChannel ch (kE key)"

lemma correctCompositionKS_exprChannel_k_Q:
assumes "subcomponents PQ = {P,Q}" 
       and "correctCompositionKS PQ"
       and "kKS key \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ"
       and "ch \<in> ins Q"
       and h1:"exprChannel ch (kE key)"
       and "kKS key \<notin> specKeysSecrets PQ"
       and "correctCompositionIn PQ"
shows    "ch \<in> ins PQ \<and> exprChannel ch (kE key)"

lemma correctCompositionKS_exprChannel_k_Qex:
assumes "subcomponents PQ = {P,Q}" 
        and "correctCompositionKS PQ"
        and "kKS key \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ"
        and "ch \<in> ins Q"
        and "exprChannel ch (kE key)"
        and "kKS key \<notin> specKeysSecrets PQ"
        and "correctCompositionIn PQ"
shows    "\<exists>ch. ch \<in> ins PQ \<and> exprChannel ch (kE key)"

lemma correctCompositionKS_exprChannel_s_P:
assumes "subcomponents PQ = {P,Q}" 
       and "correctCompositionKS PQ"
       and "sKS secret \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ"
       and "ch \<in> ins P"
       and "exprChannel ch (sE secret)"
       and "sKS secret \<notin> specKeysSecrets PQ"
       and "correctCompositionIn PQ"
shows    "ch \<in> ins PQ \<and> exprChannel ch (sE secret)"

lemma correctCompositionKS_exprChannel_s_Pex:
assumes "subcomponents PQ = {P,Q}" 
       and "correctCompositionKS PQ"
       and "sKS secret \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ"
       and "ch \<in> ins P"
       and "exprChannel ch (sE secret)"
       and "sKS secret \<notin> specKeysSecrets PQ"
       and "correctCompositionIn PQ"
shows    "\<exists>ch. ch \<in> ins PQ \<and> exprChannel ch (sE secret)"

lemma correctCompositionKS_exprChannel_s_Q:
assumes "subcomponents PQ = {P,Q}" 
       and "correctCompositionKS PQ"
       and "sKS secret \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ"
       and "ch \<in> ins Q"
       and h1:"exprChannel ch (sE secret)"
       and "sKS secret \<notin> specKeysSecrets PQ"
       and "correctCompositionIn PQ"
shows    "ch \<in> ins PQ \<and> exprChannel ch (sE secret)"

lemma correctCompositionKS_exprChannel_s_Qex:
assumes "subcomponents PQ = {P,Q}" 
       and "correctCompositionKS PQ"
       and "sKS secret \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ"
       and "ch \<in> ins Q"
       and "exprChannel ch (sE secret)"
       and "sKS secret \<notin> specKeysSecrets PQ"
       and "correctCompositionIn PQ"
shows    "\<exists>ch. ch \<in> ins PQ \<and> exprChannel ch (sE secret)"
translations:
lemma LocalSecretsComposition1:
assumes "ls \<in> LocalSecrets P"
       and "subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}"
shows    "ls \<in> LocalSecrets PQ"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ls \<in> LocalSecrets PQ
using assms
by (simp (no_asm) only: LocalSecretsDef, auto)

lemma  LocalSecretsComposition_exprChannel_k:
assumes "exprChannel x (kE Keys)"
       and "\<not> ine P (kE Keys)"
       and "\<not> ine Q (kE Keys)"
       and "\<not> (x \<notin> ins P \<and> x \<notin> ins Q)"
shows "False"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. False
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  exprChannel x (kE Keys)
  \<not> ine P (kE Keys)
  \<not> ine Q (kE Keys)
  \<not> (x \<notin> ins P \<and> x \<notin> ins Q)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. False
by (metis ine_def)

lemma  LocalSecretsComposition_exprChannel_s:
assumes "exprChannel x (sE Secrets)"
       and "\<not> ine P (sE Secrets)"
       and "\<not> ine Q (sE Secrets)"
       and "\<not> (x \<notin> ins P \<and> x \<notin> ins Q)"
shows "False"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. False
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  exprChannel x (sE Secrets)
  \<not> ine P (sE Secrets)
  \<not> ine Q (sE Secrets)
  \<not> (x \<notin> ins P \<and> x \<notin> ins Q)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. False
by (metis ine_ins_neg1)

lemma LocalSecretsComposition_neg1_k:
assumes "subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}"
       and "correctCompositionLoc PQ"
       and "\<not> ine P (kE Keys)"
       and "\<not> ine Q (kE Keys)"
       and "kKS Keys \<notin> LocalSecrets P"
       and "kKS Keys \<notin> LocalSecrets Q"
shows    "kKS Keys \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. kKS Keys \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. kKS Keys \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
from assms

proof (chain)
picking this:
  subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}
  correctCompositionLoc PQ
  \<not> ine P (kE Keys)
  \<not> ine Q (kE Keys)
  kKS Keys \<notin> LocalSecrets P
  kKS Keys \<notin> LocalSecrets Q
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}
  correctCompositionLoc PQ
  \<not> ine P (kE Keys)
  \<not> ine Q (kE Keys)
  kKS Keys \<notin> LocalSecrets P
  kKS Keys \<notin> LocalSecrets Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. kKS Keys \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ

apply (simp (no_asm) only: LocalSecretsDef, 
           simp add: correctCompositionLoc_def, clarify)
by (rule LocalSecretsComposition_exprChannel_k, auto)

proof (state)
this:
  kKS Keys \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma LocalSecretsComposition_neg_k:
assumes "subcomponents PQ = {P,Q}"
       and "correctCompositionLoc PQ"
       and "correctCompositionKS PQ"
       and "(kKS m) \<notin> specKeysSecrets P"
       and "(kKS m) \<notin> specKeysSecrets Q"
       and "\<not> ine P (kE m)"
       and "\<not> ine Q (kE m)"
       and "(kKS m) \<notin> ((LocalSecrets P) \<union> (LocalSecrets Q))"
shows    "(kKS m) \<notin> (LocalSecrets PQ)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. kKS m \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. kKS m \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
from assms

proof (chain)
picking this:
  subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}
  correctCompositionLoc PQ
  correctCompositionKS PQ
  kKS m \<notin> specKeysSecrets P
  kKS m \<notin> specKeysSecrets Q
  \<not> ine P (kE m)
  \<not> ine Q (kE m)
  kKS m \<notin> LocalSecrets P \<union> LocalSecrets Q
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}
  correctCompositionLoc PQ
  correctCompositionKS PQ
  kKS m \<notin> specKeysSecrets P
  kKS m \<notin> specKeysSecrets Q
  \<not> ine P (kE m)
  \<not> ine Q (kE m)
  kKS m \<notin> LocalSecrets P \<union> LocalSecrets Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. kKS m \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ

apply (simp (no_asm) only: LocalSecretsDef, 
           simp add: correctCompositionLoc_def, clarify)
by (rule LocalSecretsComposition_exprChannel_k, auto)

proof (state)
this:
  kKS m \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma LocalSecretsComposition_neg_s:
assumes subPQ:"subcomponents PQ = {P,Q}"
       and cCompLoc:"correctCompositionLoc PQ"
       and cCompKS:"correctCompositionKS PQ"
       and notKSP:"(sKS m) \<notin> specKeysSecrets P"
       and notKSQ:"(sKS m) \<notin> specKeysSecrets Q"
       and "\<not> ine P (sE m)"
       and "\<not> ine Q (sE m)"
       and notLocSeqPQ:"(sKS m) \<notin> ((LocalSecrets P) \<union> (LocalSecrets Q))"
shows   "(sKS m) \<notin> (LocalSecrets PQ)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sKS m \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sKS m \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
from subPQ and cCompKS and notKSP and notKSQ

proof (chain)
picking this:
  subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}
  correctCompositionKS PQ
  sKS m \<notin> specKeysSecrets P
  sKS m \<notin> specKeysSecrets Q
have sg1:"sKS m \<notin> specKeysSecrets PQ"

proof (prove)
using this:
  subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}
  correctCompositionKS PQ
  sKS m \<notin> specKeysSecrets P
  sKS m \<notin> specKeysSecrets Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sKS m \<notin> specKeysSecrets PQ
by (simp add: correctCompositionKS_neg1)

proof (state)
this:
  sKS m \<notin> specKeysSecrets PQ

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sKS m \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
from subPQ and cCompLoc and notLocSeqPQ

proof (chain)
picking this:
  subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}
  correctCompositionLoc PQ
  sKS m \<notin> LocalSecrets P \<union> LocalSecrets Q

have sg2:
   "sKS m \<notin>  \<Union> (LocalSecrets ` subcomponents PQ)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}
  correctCompositionLoc PQ
  sKS m \<notin> LocalSecrets P \<union> LocalSecrets Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sKS m \<notin> \<Union> (LocalSecrets ` subcomponents PQ)
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  sKS m \<notin> \<Union> (LocalSecrets ` subcomponents PQ)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sKS m \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
from sg1 and sg2 and assms

proof (chain)
picking this:
  sKS m \<notin> specKeysSecrets PQ
  sKS m \<notin> \<Union> (LocalSecrets ` subcomponents PQ)
  subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}
  correctCompositionLoc PQ
  correctCompositionKS PQ
  sKS m \<notin> specKeysSecrets P
  sKS m \<notin> specKeysSecrets Q
  \<not> ine P (sE m)
  \<not> ine Q (sE m)
  sKS m \<notin> LocalSecrets P \<union> LocalSecrets Q
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  sKS m \<notin> specKeysSecrets PQ
  sKS m \<notin> \<Union> (LocalSecrets ` subcomponents PQ)
  subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}
  correctCompositionLoc PQ
  correctCompositionKS PQ
  sKS m \<notin> specKeysSecrets P
  sKS m \<notin> specKeysSecrets Q
  \<not> ine P (sE m)
  \<not> ine Q (sE m)
  sKS m \<notin> LocalSecrets P \<union> LocalSecrets Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sKS m \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ

apply (simp (no_asm) only: LocalSecretsDef, 
           simp add: correctCompositionLoc_def, clarify)
by (rule LocalSecretsComposition_exprChannel_s, auto)

proof (state)
this:
  sKS m \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma LocalSecretsComposition_neg:
assumes "subcomponents PQ = {P,Q}" 
       and "correctCompositionLoc PQ" 
       and "correctCompositionKS PQ"
       and "ks \<notin> specKeysSecrets P"
       and "ks \<notin> specKeysSecrets Q"
       and h1:"\<forall> m. ks = kKS m \<longrightarrow> (\<not> ine P (kE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (kE m))"
       and h2:"\<forall> m. ks = sKS m \<longrightarrow> (\<not> ine P (sE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (sE m))"
       and "ks \<notin> ((LocalSecrets P) \<union> (LocalSecrets Q))"
shows   "ks \<notin> (LocalSecrets PQ)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
proof (cases "ks")

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x1. ks = kKS x1 \<Longrightarrow> ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
 2. \<And>x2. ks = sKS x2 \<Longrightarrow> ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
fix m

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x1. ks = kKS x1 \<Longrightarrow> ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
 2. \<And>x2. ks = sKS x2 \<Longrightarrow> ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
assume a1:"ks = kKS m"

proof (state)
this:
  ks = kKS m

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x1. ks = kKS x1 \<Longrightarrow> ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
 2. \<And>x2. ks = sKS x2 \<Longrightarrow> ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
from this and h1

proof (chain)
picking this:
  ks = kKS m
  \<forall>m.
     ks = kKS m \<longrightarrow>
     \<not> ine P (kE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (kE m)
have "\<not> ine P (kE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (kE m)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  ks = kKS m
  \<forall>m.
     ks = kKS m \<longrightarrow>
     \<not> ine P (kE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (kE m)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> ine P (kE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (kE m)
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  \<not> ine P (kE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (kE m)

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x1. ks = kKS x1 \<Longrightarrow> ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
 2. \<And>x2. ks = sKS x2 \<Longrightarrow> ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
from this and a1 and assms

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<not> ine P (kE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (kE m)
  ks = kKS m
  subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}
  correctCompositionLoc PQ
  correctCompositionKS PQ
  ks \<notin> specKeysSecrets P
  ks \<notin> specKeysSecrets Q
  \<forall>m.
     ks = kKS m \<longrightarrow>
     \<not> ine P (kE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (kE m)
  \<forall>m.
     ks = sKS m \<longrightarrow>
     \<not> ine P (sE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (sE m)
  ks \<notin> LocalSecrets P \<union> LocalSecrets Q
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<not> ine P (kE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (kE m)
  ks = kKS m
  subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}
  correctCompositionLoc PQ
  correctCompositionKS PQ
  ks \<notin> specKeysSecrets P
  ks \<notin> specKeysSecrets Q
  \<forall>m.
     ks = kKS m \<longrightarrow>
     \<not> ine P (kE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (kE m)
  \<forall>m.
     ks = sKS m \<longrightarrow>
     \<not> ine P (sE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (sE m)
  ks \<notin> LocalSecrets P \<union> LocalSecrets Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
by (simp add: LocalSecretsComposition_neg_k)

proof (state)
this:
  ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x2. ks = sKS x2 \<Longrightarrow> ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
next

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x2. ks = sKS x2 \<Longrightarrow> ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
fix m

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x2. ks = sKS x2 \<Longrightarrow> ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
assume a2:"ks = sKS m"

proof (state)
this:
  ks = sKS m

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x2. ks = sKS x2 \<Longrightarrow> ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
from this and h2

proof (chain)
picking this:
  ks = sKS m
  \<forall>m.
     ks = sKS m \<longrightarrow>
     \<not> ine P (sE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (sE m)
have "\<not> ine P (sE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (sE m)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  ks = sKS m
  \<forall>m.
     ks = sKS m \<longrightarrow>
     \<not> ine P (sE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (sE m)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> ine P (sE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (sE m)
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  \<not> ine P (sE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (sE m)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x2. ks = sKS x2 \<Longrightarrow> ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
from this and a2 and assms

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<not> ine P (sE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (sE m)
  ks = sKS m
  subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}
  correctCompositionLoc PQ
  correctCompositionKS PQ
  ks \<notin> specKeysSecrets P
  ks \<notin> specKeysSecrets Q
  \<forall>m.
     ks = kKS m \<longrightarrow>
     \<not> ine P (kE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (kE m)
  \<forall>m.
     ks = sKS m \<longrightarrow>
     \<not> ine P (sE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (sE m)
  ks \<notin> LocalSecrets P \<union> LocalSecrets Q
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<not> ine P (sE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (sE m)
  ks = sKS m
  subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}
  correctCompositionLoc PQ
  correctCompositionKS PQ
  ks \<notin> specKeysSecrets P
  ks \<notin> specKeysSecrets Q
  \<forall>m.
     ks = kKS m \<longrightarrow>
     \<not> ine P (kE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (kE m)
  \<forall>m.
     ks = sKS m \<longrightarrow>
     \<not> ine P (sE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (sE m)
  ks \<notin> LocalSecrets P \<union> LocalSecrets Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
by (simp add: LocalSecretsComposition_neg_s)

proof (state)
this:
  ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma LocalSecretsComposition_neg1_s:
assumes "subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}"
       and "correctCompositionLoc PQ"
       and "\<not> ine P (sE s)"
       and "\<not> ine Q (sE s)"
       and "sKS s \<notin> LocalSecrets P" 
       and "sKS s \<notin> LocalSecrets Q"
shows    "sKS s \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sKS s \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sKS s \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
from assms

proof (chain)
picking this:
  subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}
  correctCompositionLoc PQ
  \<not> ine P (sE s)
  \<not> ine Q (sE s)
  sKS s \<notin> LocalSecrets P
  sKS s \<notin> LocalSecrets Q

have 
   "sKS s \<notin>  \<Union> (LocalSecrets ` subcomponents PQ)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}
  correctCompositionLoc PQ
  \<not> ine P (sE s)
  \<not> ine Q (sE s)
  sKS s \<notin> LocalSecrets P
  sKS s \<notin> LocalSecrets Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sKS s \<notin> \<Union> (LocalSecrets ` subcomponents PQ)
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  sKS s \<notin> \<Union> (LocalSecrets ` subcomponents PQ)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sKS s \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
from  assms and this

proof (chain)
picking this:
  subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}
  correctCompositionLoc PQ
  \<not> ine P (sE s)
  \<not> ine Q (sE s)
  sKS s \<notin> LocalSecrets P
  sKS s \<notin> LocalSecrets Q
  sKS s \<notin> \<Union> (LocalSecrets ` subcomponents PQ)
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}
  correctCompositionLoc PQ
  \<not> ine P (sE s)
  \<not> ine Q (sE s)
  sKS s \<notin> LocalSecrets P
  sKS s \<notin> LocalSecrets Q
  sKS s \<notin> \<Union> (LocalSecrets ` subcomponents PQ)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sKS s \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ

apply (simp (no_asm) only: LocalSecretsDef, 
              simp add: correctCompositionLoc_def, clarify)
by (rule LocalSecretsComposition_exprChannel_s, auto)

proof (state)
this:
  sKS s \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma LocalSecretsComposition_neg1:
assumes "subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}"
       and "correctCompositionLoc PQ"
       and h1:"\<forall> m. ks = kKS m \<longrightarrow> (\<not> ine P (kE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (kE m))" 
       and h2:"\<forall> m. ks = sKS m \<longrightarrow> (\<not> ine P (sE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (sE m))"
       and "ks \<notin> LocalSecrets P"
       and "ks \<notin> LocalSecrets Q"
shows    "ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
proof (cases "ks")

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x1. ks = kKS x1 \<Longrightarrow> ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
 2. \<And>x2. ks = sKS x2 \<Longrightarrow> ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
fix m

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x1. ks = kKS x1 \<Longrightarrow> ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
 2. \<And>x2. ks = sKS x2 \<Longrightarrow> ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
assume a1:"ks = kKS m"

proof (state)
this:
  ks = kKS m

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x1. ks = kKS x1 \<Longrightarrow> ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
 2. \<And>x2. ks = sKS x2 \<Longrightarrow> ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
from this and h1

proof (chain)
picking this:
  ks = kKS m
  \<forall>m.
     ks = kKS m \<longrightarrow>
     \<not> ine P (kE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (kE m)
have "\<not> ine P (kE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (kE m)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  ks = kKS m
  \<forall>m.
     ks = kKS m \<longrightarrow>
     \<not> ine P (kE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (kE m)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> ine P (kE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (kE m)
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  \<not> ine P (kE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (kE m)

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x1. ks = kKS x1 \<Longrightarrow> ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
 2. \<And>x2. ks = sKS x2 \<Longrightarrow> ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
from this and a1 and assms

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<not> ine P (kE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (kE m)
  ks = kKS m
  subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}
  correctCompositionLoc PQ
  \<forall>m.
     ks = kKS m \<longrightarrow>
     \<not> ine P (kE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (kE m)
  \<forall>m.
     ks = sKS m \<longrightarrow>
     \<not> ine P (sE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (sE m)
  ks \<notin> LocalSecrets P
  ks \<notin> LocalSecrets Q
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<not> ine P (kE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (kE m)
  ks = kKS m
  subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}
  correctCompositionLoc PQ
  \<forall>m.
     ks = kKS m \<longrightarrow>
     \<not> ine P (kE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (kE m)
  \<forall>m.
     ks = sKS m \<longrightarrow>
     \<not> ine P (sE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (sE m)
  ks \<notin> LocalSecrets P
  ks \<notin> LocalSecrets Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
by (simp add: LocalSecretsComposition_neg1_k)

proof (state)
this:
  ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x2. ks = sKS x2 \<Longrightarrow> ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
next

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x2. ks = sKS x2 \<Longrightarrow> ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
fix m

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x2. ks = sKS x2 \<Longrightarrow> ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
assume a2:"ks = sKS m"

proof (state)
this:
  ks = sKS m

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x2. ks = sKS x2 \<Longrightarrow> ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
from this and h2

proof (chain)
picking this:
  ks = sKS m
  \<forall>m.
     ks = sKS m \<longrightarrow>
     \<not> ine P (sE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (sE m)
have "\<not> ine P (sE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (sE m)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  ks = sKS m
  \<forall>m.
     ks = sKS m \<longrightarrow>
     \<not> ine P (sE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (sE m)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> ine P (sE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (sE m)
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  \<not> ine P (sE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (sE m)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x2. ks = sKS x2 \<Longrightarrow> ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
from this and a2 and assms

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<not> ine P (sE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (sE m)
  ks = sKS m
  subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}
  correctCompositionLoc PQ
  \<forall>m.
     ks = kKS m \<longrightarrow>
     \<not> ine P (kE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (kE m)
  \<forall>m.
     ks = sKS m \<longrightarrow>
     \<not> ine P (sE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (sE m)
  ks \<notin> LocalSecrets P
  ks \<notin> LocalSecrets Q
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<not> ine P (sE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (sE m)
  ks = sKS m
  subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}
  correctCompositionLoc PQ
  \<forall>m.
     ks = kKS m \<longrightarrow>
     \<not> ine P (kE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (kE m)
  \<forall>m.
     ks = sKS m \<longrightarrow>
     \<not> ine P (sE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (sE m)
  ks \<notin> LocalSecrets P
  ks \<notin> LocalSecrets Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
by (simp add: LocalSecretsComposition_neg1_s)

proof (state)
this:
  ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma LocalSecretsComposition_ine1_k:
assumes "kKS k \<in> LocalSecrets PQ" 
       and "subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}"
       and "correctCompositionLoc PQ" 
       and "\<not> ine Q (kE k)"
       and "kKS k \<notin> LocalSecrets P"
       and "kKS k \<notin> LocalSecrets Q"
shows    "ine P (kE k)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ine P (kE k)
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  kKS k \<in> LocalSecrets PQ
  subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}
  correctCompositionLoc PQ
  \<not> ine Q (kE k)
  kKS k \<notin> LocalSecrets P
  kKS k \<notin> LocalSecrets Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ine P (kE k)
by (metis LocalSecretsComposition_neg1_k)

lemma LocalSecretsComposition_neg_loc_k:
assumes "kKS key \<notin> LocalSecrets P"
       and "exprChannel ch (kE key)"
       and "kKS key \<notin> specKeysSecrets P"
shows    "ch \<notin> loc P"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ch \<notin> loc P
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  kKS key \<notin> LocalSecrets P
  exprChannel ch (kE key)
  kKS key \<notin> specKeysSecrets P

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ch \<notin> loc P
by (simp only: LocalSecretsDef, auto)

lemma correctCompositionKS_exprChannel_k_P:
assumes "subcomponents PQ = {P,Q}" 
       and "correctCompositionKS PQ"
       and "kKS key \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ"
       and "ch \<in> ins P"
       and "exprChannel ch (kE key)"
       and "kKS key \<notin> specKeysSecrets PQ"
       and "correctCompositionIn PQ"
shows    "ch \<in> ins PQ \<and> exprChannel ch (kE key)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ch \<in> ins PQ \<and> exprChannel ch (kE key)
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}
  correctCompositionKS PQ
  kKS key \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
  ch \<in> ins P
  exprChannel ch (kE key)
  kKS key \<notin> specKeysSecrets PQ
  correctCompositionIn PQ

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ch \<in> ins PQ \<and> exprChannel ch (kE key)
by (metis LocalSecretsComposition_neg_loc_k correctCompositionIn_L1)

       and "ch \<in> ins Q"
       and "exprChannel ch (sE secret)"
       and "sKS secret \<notin> specKeysSecrets PQ"
       and "correctCompositionIn PQ"
shows    "\<exists>ch. ch \<in> ins PQ \<and> exprChannel ch (sE secret)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>ch. ch \<in> ins PQ \<and> exprChannel ch (sE secret)
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}
  correctCompositionKS PQ
  sKS secret \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ
  ch \<in> ins Q
  exprChannel ch (sE secret)
  sKS secret \<notin> specKeysSecrets PQ
  correctCompositionIn PQ

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>ch. ch \<in> ins PQ \<and> exprChannel ch (sE secret)
by (metis correctCompositionKS_exprChannel_s_Q)
end
